Description: Project Coordination: Assist in planning, organizing, and managing projects by coordinating tasks, timelines, and resources to ensure timely completion and successful outcomes.Scheduling: Create and maintain schedules for meetings, appointments, and project milestones, ensuring all team members are informed of upcoming events.Team Communication: Facilitate effective communication among team members, clients, and stakeholders, ensuring everyone is well-informed and up-to-date on project developments.Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date project documentation, records, and reports, ensuring data integrity and easy access to essential information.Task Management: Monitor project tasks and deadlines, identifying potential delays or issues and proactively resolving them to keep projects on track.Resource Allocation: Assist in allocating resources, such as personnel, equipment, and materials, to support project requirements and optimize productivity. Skills
Skills: minimum 2 years of experience as coordinator
